attributes.action: Scrap the use of BMI as a measurement of obesity as it has flaws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BMI (Body Mass Index) is flawed as it makes professional rugby players who are very fit and active as obese. Plus, there are some people that due to their medication makes them difficult to shift the excess weight gained when taking their medication.

I wish companies will scrap the BMI index and replace it with a fairer system
